content.question: Which of the following is defined by the significance level of a hypothesis test?

choices.label: The probability of Type <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>II</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> error
The probability of Type <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>I</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> error

content.answer: The probability of Type <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>I</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> error

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
